name: SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING, LLC, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Sands Bethworks Gaming, LLC v. Pennsylvania Department of Revenue

parties: SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING, LLC, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of April, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING, LLC, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

April 29, 2009.
